description: Allowlist for filtering known third-party warning noise. Only applies to third-party warnings; our code warnings are never filtered.

patterns.rationale: pkg_resources deprecation warnings from setuptools are ubiquitous and not actionable until ecosystem migrates
distutils deprecation warnings are expected as Python 3.12+ removes distutils
imp module deprecation from older packages; not actionable
datetime.utcnow deprecation in third-party packages; tracked separately
datetime.utcfromtimestamp deprecation in third-party packages; tracked separately
cgi module deprecation warnings from legacy packages
NamedTuple field order warning in older type stubs
Asyncio ResourceWarning from base_events in third-party event loop handling; not actionable in our code

notes: This allowlist ONLY filters third-party (site-packages) warnings.
High-risk categories (PytestRemovedIn9Warning, SAWarning, coroutine warnings) are NEVER filtered.
Our code warnings (backend/app/, backend/tests/) are NEVER filtered.
Review dates indicate when patterns should be re-evaluated.
